summary: Completed comprehensive testing of budget management application (Gestor de Presupuestos). Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend is 95% functional with excellent user experience. Core features including registration, login, product management, marking techniques, and quote generation are working perfectly.

resolved_issues.issue: bcrypt password hashing limitation - passwords longer than 72 bytes caused errors
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added password truncation in get_password_hash function

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in quote generation
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added clean_product function to remove _id fields before serialization

minor_issues.issue: Generated quotes not appearing in history table despite successful API calls
minor_issues.impact: Users cannot view previously generated quotes in history page
minor_issues.note: Backend API /api/quotes works correctly, issue appears to be in frontend data handling

design_feedback.feedback: Excellent professional design with emerald green theme, good contrast, proper spacing and typography
Clean navigation bar with proper active states and user info display

passed_tests: User login with JWT token authentication
Manual product creation with form validation
Quote generation with 3-tier pricing (Basic, Medium, Premium)
Quote form validation and category selection
action_item_for_E1: Fix quote history display issue - quotes are being generated and saved successfully (backend confirmed) but not appearing in the history table on frontend. Check QuoteHistory component data fetching and rendering logic.
